attributes.action: Peterborough Women’s Association would like a women’s centre in Peterborough.
attributes.background: Peterborough Women’s Association is a community support group which has over 2000 members online in Peterborough. It is a very successful diverse group. The members would now like it to be based in a centre so all women can access it. The centre will be used for women to access support services.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here:

https://democracy.peterborough.gov.uk/mgEPetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1
